name: TextureRunLengthFeatures
description: A tool to calculate texture run length features on an input image.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input image.

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The path to the input image file.

inputs.name: Number of Bins Per Axis
inputs.description: The number of bins per axis for the histogram.

inputs.name: Mask Image
inputs.description: The path to the mask image file.

inputs.name: Mask Label
inputs.description: The label value in the mask image to be used.

output-files.name: Low Grey Level Run Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: Low Grey Level Run Emphasis.

output-files.name: High Grey Level Run Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: High Grey Level Run Emphasis.

output-files.name: Short Run Low Grey Level Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: Short Run Low Grey Level Emphasis.

output-files.name: Short Run High Grey Level Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: Short Run High Grey Level Emphasis.

output-files.name: Long Run Low Grey Level Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: Long Run Low Grey Level Emphasis.

output-files.name: Long Run High Grey Level Emphasis
output-files.description: Output feature: Long Run High Grey Level Emphasis.

author: ANTs Developers
